title: New: Los Porcos – Sunshine
content:
Photo: Cécilia Montesinos

Yacht rock partiers Los Porcos are rapidly converting everyone to their unique brand of happy go lucky surf pop.

With a live show that appears as unrehearsed as it is mind-blowingly brilliant, their new track Sunshine is a real 80’s throwback, and about as far from the call-to-arms rigidity of WU LYF as one could possibly imagine. Released 15 September on Caledonia Records, it’s safe to say that the pigs are here to stay. Check out Sunshine below, and a live video taken at MIDI Festival.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
